00029 using namespace std;

00031 namespace brics_3d {

00033 Logger::Loglevel Logger::minLoglevel = Logger::WARNING;
00034 bool Logger::useFilename = false;
00035 bool Logger::useLogfile = false;
00036 std::string Logger::logfilename;
00037 Logger::Listener* Logger::listener = 0;
00038 std::ofstream Logger::logfile;
00039 
00040 Logger::Logger(Loglevel level) {
00041         needNewline = false;
00042         this->level = level;
00043         isAboveLoglevel = (level >= minLoglevel);
00044 }
00045 
00046 Logger::~Logger() {
00047         if (isAboveLoglevel)
00048                 flush();
00049 }
00050 
00051 void Logger::setMinLoglevel(Loglevel minLoglevel) {
00052         Logger::minLoglevel = minLoglevel;
00053 }
00054 
00055 Logger::Loglevel Logger::getMinLoglevel() {
00056         return Logger::minLoglevel;
00057 }
00058 
00059 void Logger::setUseFilename(bool useFilenames) {
00060         Logger::useFilename = useFilenames;
00061 }
00062 
00063 void Logger::setLogfile(std::string filename, bool append) {
00064         if (useLogfile)
00065                 logfile.close();
00066 
00067         useLogfile = true;
00068         ios_base::openmode mode = ios::out;
00069         if (!append)
00070                 mode |= ios::trunc;
00071         else
00072                 mode |= ios::app;
00073         logfile.open(filename.c_str(), mode);
00074 }
00075 
00076 void Logger::setListener(Listener* listener) {
00077         Logger::listener = listener;
00078 }
00079 
00080 std::string& Logger::levelToString(Loglevel loglevel) {
00081         static std::string names[] = {"DEBUG", "INFO", "WARNING", "ERROR", "FATAL"};
00082         return names[loglevel];
00083 }
00084         
00085 std::ostream& Logger::write(std::string filename, int line) {
00086         if (!isAboveLoglevel)
00087                 return stream; //todo: should return stream which does not do anything
00088 
00089         stream << "[" << levelToString(level);
00090         if (useFilename)
00091                 stream << " " << filename << "(" << line << ")";
00092         stream << "] ";
00093         needNewline = true;
00094 
00095         return stream;
00096 }
00097 
00098 void Logger::flush() {
00099         if (needNewline)
00100                 stream << endl;
00101 
00102         if (useLogfile) {
00103                 logfile << stream.str();
00104                 logfile.flush();
00105         }
00106 
00107         if (listener)
00108                 listener->write(level, stream.str());
00109 
00110         switch (level) {
00111         case FATAL: 
00112 #ifdef WIN32
00113                 MessageBox(0, stream.str().c_str(), "BRICS_3D Fatal Error", MB_OK|MB_ICONERROR);
00114 #else
00115                 cerr << stream.str();
00116 #endif
00117                 exit(0);
00118         case LOGERROR: 
00119                 cerr << stream.str();
00120                 break;
00121         default:
00122                 cout << stream.str();
00123         }
00124 
00125 }
00126 
00127 } //namespace brics_3d
